      • setMessageFormat

        public void setMessageFormat(String messageFormat)
        Parameters:
        messageFormat - The template for the body of the message to send. Parameter #0 will be substituted with the ID of the job, and parameter #1 will be substituted with the exit code.

        Parameters:

        code - What the exit code was.
